amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to demolish or restrict use of the interchange located at Exit 131 of Interstate Route 40 and State Route 16 in Catawba County, North Carolina.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available to demolish or restrict use of the interchange located at Exit 131 of Interstate Route 40 and State Route 16 in Catawba County, North Carolina.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. McHenry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
